name: Sharepoint
description: Do click on 'Documents' first to access files

name: 2020 Documents and Protocol
description: 'E-prime Scripts' - the files on the lab computer are the most up to date this needs updating
'Printed' - these are the materials that need printing for each participant (ethics materials, goal and rumination ratings)
There rest of the files are those programmed into e-prime (e.g. writing tasks)
This includes the mp3 files that are used in the audio induction

name: 2020 Data
description: 'Participants' contains the log of participants and a record of pre-processing steps
The 'eprime' folder contains the raw e.dat files and those exported to excel (and pre-processed)
The 'macros' folder contains the macros I have created to pre-process the psychophys and SART data for your reference
The 'psychophys' folder contains the raw and pre-processed files from Acknowledge, as well as excel output files
The 'qualtrics' folder contains the export of the part 1 screener data from Qualtrics
The 'ratings' folder contains the scanned in ratings and the data inputted and crosschecked in excel
See the separate tutorial for each of these for details on extraction and preprocessing steps

name: Backing up data
description: At the end of the day, all raw data needs uploading to sharepoint
All data is also backed up to harddrives
Lab computers are not connected to network therefore this is via hard drive (or memory stick for psychophys computer)
You will need to first move the eprime files from the live versions into a participant folder under 'Data'
On my laptop, I then copy memory stick files over onto harddrive and then all files are uploaded to sharepoint
Once a week, back up the harddrive onto the second harddrive too
The ratings sheets also need scanning and/or inputting into the excel file on sharepoint
